publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2460 Donald Gorrie: Eurosource (Falkirk) Quality Scotland Award—That the Parliament congratulates the recycling group, Eurosource, based in Falkirk, on winning the Corporate Citizenship award at Quality Scotland’s recent "Scottish Awards for Business Excellence" ceremony and welcomes the organisation’s success and its contribution to the fundraising activities of a number of Scotland’s charities, its commitment to community involvement and the useful work that it does in reducing the amount of waste going to landfill in Scotland.
S2M-2460 Eurosource (Falkirk) Quality Scotland Award (lodged on 22 February 2005) Michael Matheson*

S2M-2460 Eurosource (Falkirk) Quality Scotland Award (lodged on 22 February 2005) Rob Gibson*, Fiona Hyslop*, Alex Neil*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Margaret Mitchell*, Eleanor Scott*, Robin Harper*, Patrick Harvie*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2460 Eurosource (Falkirk) Quality Scotland Award (lodged on 22 February 2005) Shiona Baird*, Fergus Ewing*
S2M-2460 Eurosource (Falkirk) Quality Scotland Award (lodged on 22 February 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-2460 Eurosource (Falkirk) Quality Scotland Award (lodged on 22 February 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-2460 Eurosource (Falkirk) Quality Scotland Award (lodged on 22 February 2005) Ms Sandra White*, John Swinburne*
S2M-2460 Eurosource (Falkirk) Quality Scotland Award (lodged on 22 February 2005) Cathy Peattie*
